Module it.polimi.ingsw.am52
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am52.model.cards

Class ResourceFrontFace

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am52.model.cards.CardFace
it.polimi.ingsw.am52.model.cards.KingdomCardFace
it.polimi.ingsw.am52.model.cards.ResourceFrontFace
All Implemented Interfaces:
ItemsProvider, Pluggable, ResourcesProvider
Direct Known Subclasses:
AnimalResourceFrontFace, FungiResourceFrontFace, InsectResourceFrontFace, PlantResourceFrontFace
public abstract class ResourceFrontFace extends KingdomCardFace
The base class of all front faces of Resource Cards. Resource cards do not need any resource in order to be placed on the playing board. Some resource card gives points when placed.

      Creates a Resource card front face, without any associated point, with the specified corners.
      Parameters:
      topRight - The top-right corner.
      bottomRight - The bottom-right corner.
      bottomLeft - The bottom-left corner.
      topLeft - The top-left corner.

    • ResourceFrontFace

      protected ResourceFrontFace(CardCorner topRight, CardCorner bottomRight, CardCorner bottomLeft, CardCorner topLeft, CardPoints points)
      Creates a Resource card front face, with the specified corners and the specified points.
      Parameters:
      topRight - The top-right corner.
      bottomRight - The bottom-right corner.
      bottomLeft - The bottom-left corner.
      topLeft - The top-left corner.
      points - The instance that calculates the points gained by the player when the card is placed on the playing board.

  • Method Details

    • getCards

      public static ImmutableList<ResourceFrontFace> getCards()
      Get all front faces of Resource cards. The list is sorted as the card pictures on the ref. manual.
      Returns:
      A list with all front faces of the Resource cards.
